transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Mr. Vinod Kumar Modi baat kar rahe hain, Shree Hari Industry se?
Customer: Shree Hari Industry se Yashwant baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Hi sir, good afternoon. Main Rishu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART Noida se.
Your relationship manager. Actually sir, aapka aaj ek discussion hua tha account manager se Garima se aur unhi ki conversation ke bihaf pe sir aapne not satisfied mark kara hai. So I just wanted to know sir kya issue matlab call mein aisi kya cheez rahi. Haan ji.
Customer: Ek second.
Executive: Award ka pura name?
Customer: Taiwan external trade development council hai na. Pura name.
Executive: Awards ka hoga pura name ya fir just Taiwan excellence.
Customer: Full name.
Customer: To AC product jayega na isme?
Customer: Haan to ek kaam kar confirm karke mujhe bol.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji mam. Sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan haan aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir main wohi puch rahi thi aapse ki Garima ki conversation mein aise kya points rahe ya sir aisi kya cheez rahi ki jo aapko matlab thoda sahi nahi laga ya usko improve kar sakte hain. To aapne rate kiya hai na sir matlab not satisfied. Usi ka reason main janne ke liye call kiya aapko.
Customer: Accha just rating ka reason janne ke liye call kar rahe ho ya overall?
Executive: Nahi sir overall bhi aur jo aapne sir dekho aaj hi aapke account manager se discussion hua tha na aapki Garima se hai na unse overall point discuss hue the uske baad ek aapko rating satisfied not satisfied ka message gaya tha to aapne usko not satisfied kiya hai. Main uska reason janana chah rahi hu sir ki kya problem face kar rahe ho. Aapne kyun matlab not satisfied kiya hai further kya improvement aapko hamare end se chahiye sir?
Customer: Improvement to kuch nahi just okay hai. Jo bhi chal raha hai woh accha hai. Haan lekin problem yeh thi ki jis line mein mere product the aur usme jo mera investment tha IndiaMART ke sath. Hmm ji. Agar wohi back out main nahi kar pa raha hu to main dusri baar kyun uspe try karunga?
Executive: Sir bilkul sahi baat hai sir dekhiye renewal. Yahi reason tha mera. Ji sir. Sir dekhiye further renewal continue karna nahi karna of course yeh aapka decision hota hai sir aur in bihaf of return jo aapne lagaya hai IndiaMART pe. But sir jaisa ki main check kar pa rahi hu aapne jaise abhi almost one year aapki services ko hone wala hai. Aisa kya reason raha sir kyunki aap services wagera to use kar rahe ho inquiry bhi aa rahi hai aapko. To maturity wagera ka issue raha sir ya fir kya issue raha ki aapko ROI nahi nikal paya sir services mein?
Customer: Nahi maturity ka bhi koi aisa hai nahi problem. Problem yeh hoti hai ke koi customer aata hai theek hai to usko isme bhi koi problem nahi hai lekin kai baar uski quantity itni kam hoti hai isse jyada uska transportation charges ho jata hai. Ji. Agar yeh product out of Gujarat jaata hai. Hmm. To pehla yahi tha aur dusra ke product bahut jyada hai par utna hai nahi main product just wood house tha aur dusra key holder. Yeh do product ki success thi.
Executive: Matlab aap keh rahe ho ki sir aapko jo jyada inquiry chahiye woh aapko do hi products ki chahiye baki aapko nahi chahiye karke aisa?
Executive: Sir main yeh bol rahi hu jaise wooden key holder aapka jaise major product hai key holders, wooden key holders, wooden bird house right. QR code stand alphabet puzzle puzzle game yeh aapke products hai na to inme bataiye agar koi inquiry aapko nahi chahiye ya kisi product mein aap deal nahi kar rahe hain to usko hata dete hain sir aap mujhe bata dijiye woh aapka remove ho jayega product mein se aap bataye.
Customer: Nahi par abhi to yeh bahut late ho gaya hai I think mujhe aisa lag raha hai.
Executive: Sir dekho baat aapki bilkul theek hai but sir aisa nahi hai platform mein potential nahi hai agar aapki main product line mein baat karu na sir agar dekhiye aapke jaise major product ki bhi baat karu main jaise yeh QR code stand hai ya decorative walls ya wooden aapke stands hain inme sir matlab night lamps mein to sir 2000 plus inquiry generate hoti hai. Nahi usme daily nahi girti.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir wooden tripod boxes mein deal karte hain aap?
Customer: Haan usme yahi tha mam ke hamare paas jo thickness hai woh 3mm aur 5mm mein jaati hai aur woh 3D curve cutting nahi ho payega. Ji.
Executive: Okay okay. Usme aapka thoda sa specifications ko leke rehta hai sir thoda sa challenges.
Customer: Haan kyunki thickness hum utna accha nahi le sakte us cheez mein isliye main woh deal karta hi nahi hu kyunki karne ka bhi koi matlab nahi hai fir. Hmm hmm. Ji.
Executive: Baki sir jitne bylead wagera consume kari hai woh to aapne product related hi matlab dekh check karke hi consume kiya hoga sir. Jaisa ki abhi ji agar sir main abhi check karti hu is month mein aapne jo bylead consume kari hai sir woh almost aapne abhi 21 byleads consume kari hai nine days mein hai na right. To us un bylead mein se aise sir kuch conversion nahi nikla aapko kuch uska fruitful result nahi raha sir?
Customer: Result the result the par abhi just jo kal bylead consume hui usme Kerala gaya tha. Hmm. Agar product mein deal done bhi hoti hai to uska transportation transportation charges 7000 ja raha hai. Hmm hmm. Aur product ki value 3000. Ji. To woh possible hi nahi hai.
Executive: Jaise sir yeh ek inquiry tha aapko lastly yeh tha wooden Mahadev key holder aap quantity 100 tha number of hook seven aur type wall self business use inquiry thi yeh aapko yeh aapne consume kari. Location.
Executive: Yeh aapki Idukki India.
Customer: Nahi matlab kaun se hai?
Executive: Yeh Asif Ali karke.
Customer: Haan agar yeh.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not getting ROI from IndiaMART.

- Transportation charges are too high.

- Wants inquiries for only two products.



Resolution:

- Executive asked about the issues faced by customer.

- Executive offered to remove unwanted product categories.

- Executive explained the potential of the platform.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- roi, buyleads, transportation, product category
